text: I'll probably continue to post notes here as I go along. There were two crucial broken links on the home page of the spec: 1. RFC 822, and 2. Payloads for RSS, both of which are integral to the format. I tried to find a solid link to the RFC that would stand the test of time. And I discovered that I had copied the Payloads doc, which was originally on a domain that I let go, to the RSS site. So I'm going to use that link, instead of an archive.org link.
